Title: US sanctions two tanker owners for carrying Russian oil above price cap

Title: Occidental Petroleum in Talks to Buy Shale Driller CrownRock
Description: Occidental Petroleum Corp. is in talks to buy closely held shale driller CrownRock LP, according to people familiar with the matter, as consolidation in North America’s most prolific oil field gathers pace.

Title: Occidental Petroleum in Talks to Buy CrownRock, WSJ Reports
Description: Occidental Petroleum Corp. is in talks to buy CrownRock LP, according to the Wall Street Journal, as a dealmaking frenzy continues on the US oil patch.
